mapper.insert: insert into food_sc (id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, product_name, social_credit_code, legal_person, residence, product_addr, food_type, license_number, daily_mechanism, daily_person, Issuing_organ, Issuing_person, lussing_time, term_of_validity, my_id, permission_detail, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{residence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyMechanism,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuingOrgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lussingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termOfValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update food_sc set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_credit_code = #{socialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, residence = #{residence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_addr = #{productAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_type = #{foodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license_number = #{licenseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daily_mechanism = #{dailyMechanism,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daily_person = #{dailyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Issuing_organ = #{issuingOrgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Issuing_person = #{issuingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lussing_time = #{lussingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_of_validity = #{termOfValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_detail = #{permissionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, product_name, social_credit_code, legal_person, residence, product_addr, food_type, license_number, daily_mechanism, daily_person, Issuing_organ, Issuing_person, lussing_time, term_of_validity, my_id, permission_detail, remark from food_sc where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
